projectsList.title: Tech News
projectsList.description: This project is the pratical exam of the Javascript Advanced start2impact University's course. The task was to create a web application to democratize the spread of information in the tech field through the use of the Hacker News API service.

projectsList.title: Our Urbs
projectsList.description: This project is one of the practical exams of the Angular start2impact University's course. The task was to create a fake app using the GoREST API service. Mine is a social-like app, for people who want to share ideas and reports to improve life in urban centres.

projectsList.title: Your Space
projectsList.description: This is the final project for the master in full stack development at start2impact University. The delivery was to develop a mockup web app for a hypothetical client company. I chose to develop a platform for writing and sharing notes for a company that offers psychotherapy.

objectives.title: What I wish to work on in the future
objectives.suggestionReq: I am always looking for new skills to learn. If you would like to give me some suggestions do not hesitate to contact me!
